New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 2 月 13 日星期二 14:07:21 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Bay of Plenty man Eli Johnson allegedly murdered after testifying against Mongrel Mob ‘captain’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/he-was-a-nark-bop-man-eli-johnson-allegedly-murdered-after-testifying-against-mongrel-mob-captain/RWIZZ45A2FDL5MOUDXYCUI3JI4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/he-was-a-nark-bop-man-eli-johnson-allegedly-murdered-after-testifying-against-mongrel-mob-captain/RWIZZ45A2FDL5MOUDXYCUI3JI4/ Belinda FeekThe crown says Eli Johnson paid the ultimate price for testifying against the Mongrel Mob. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 07:00:00 +0000 Mongrel Mob Aotearoa member Quadye Hulbert, left, and prospect Billy Rielly in the dock of the High Court at Hamilton. The pair are defending a murder charge over the death of Eli Johnson on June 12, 2022, in the Bay of Plenty. Photo / Belinda Feek

Supermarket mice: Customer finds mouse running around West Auckland Pak’nSave aisles https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/supermarket-rats-customer-finds-mouse-running-around-west-auckland-paknsave-aisles/L5AC4QYITVEVHHXRFD4VGB5AXU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/supermarket-rats-customer-finds-mouse-running-around-west-auckland-paknsave-aisles/L5AC4QYITVEVHHXRFD4VGB5AXU/ Heath MooreA new mouse video involving an Auckland supermarket has emerged. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:18:32 +0000 A new rodent video has emerged on Tuesday after a customer spotted a mouse running through the Pak'nSave in Lincoln Rd.
Cyclone Gabrielle: What we’ve learned about NZ’s monster storm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyclone-gabrielle-what-weve-learned-about-nzs-monster-storm/SHL4L3WD7BHZJDRAWXMRTNDFJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/cyclone-gabrielle-what-weve-learned-about-nzs-monster-storm/SHL4L3WD7BHZJDRAWXMRTNDFJA/ Jamie MortonIt’s been a year since NZ saw its worst storm in decades. What have we learned about it? Tue, 13 Feb 2024 06:00:00 +0000 Gabrielle, pictured from satellite on February 11, 2023, was the deadliest cyclone system – and weather event in general – to strike our country since the Wahine sank amid Cyclone Giselle half a century before. Image / JMA
Police seek help in locating dangerous man Nepia Taonui in Waikato, multiple warrants for arrest https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-seek-help-in- located-dangerous-man-nepia-taonui-in-waikato-multiple-warrants-for-arrest/PWJKSQ4QTBGTTBDOGQIDLFBP6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-seek-help-in- located-dangerous-man-nepia-taonui-in-waikato-multiple-warrants-for-arrest/PWJKSQ4QTBGTTBDOGQIDLFBP6Y/ Nepia Taonui is wanted by police on multiple weapons charges. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:54:33 +0000 Nepia Taonui.
Police are seeking public’s assistance in locating Nepia Taonui, who has several warrants for his arrest.
They include weapons and firearms charges and the breaching of his court release conditions.
Taonui is believed to be in the Waikato area.
Police advise members of the public not to approach Nepia, and to report any sightings or information on his whereabouts to Police via 111, quoting case number 240115/4128.
Alternatively, please call Crimestoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111.
Photo / NZ Police
Water rescues at risk as slip takes Northland surf clubhouse out of action https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/water-rescues-at-risk-as-slip-takes-northland-surf-clubhouse-out-of-action/NOBPJKPCLBET3JJBYYKKKN5CKY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/water-rescues-at-risk-as-slip-takes-northland-surf-clubhouse-out-of-action/NOBPJKPCLBET3JJBYYKKKN5CKY/ Denise PiperWith a slip closing Mangawhai's surf clubhouse, it takes longer to get to rescues. Tue, 13 Feb 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Jess Costello, from Mangawhai Heads Surf Life Saving Club, says the clubhouse being taken out by a slip could risk lives due to the extra time it takes to get to an after-hours search and rescue. Photo / Michael Cunningham

Tue, 13 Feb 2024 04:42:58 +0000 Six residents of a Whitianga aged care facility died withing a short time of each other from the influenza A virus.
